name: hai3-monorepo
description: HAI3: Human-driven development, AI-assisted, well structured and polished framework for SaaS control panels

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run generate:colors && vite build
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@hai3/uikit-contracts && npm run build --workspace=@hai3/uikit && npm run build --workspace=@hai3/uicore && npm run build --workspace=@hai3/studio && npm run build --workspace=@hai3/cli
scripts.clean: npm run clean:artifacts && npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean:artifacts && npm run build
scripts.clean:build:packages: npm run clean:artifacts && npm run build:packages
scripts.arch:graph: npx dependency-cruiser src/ packages/ --config .dependency-cruiser.cjs --output-type dot | dot -T svg -o dependency-graph.svg
scripts.arch:dot: npx dependency-cruiser src/ packages/ --config .dependency-cruiser.cjs --output-type dot > dependency-graph.dot && echo 'âœ… DOT file saved to dependency-graph.dot (view with any DOT viewer or online tools)'
